bug.author: zaowad
bug.description: I just installed flair with pip install flair. It was installed without any error message. But after I tried to load various embeddings with flair it shows "module 'wandb' has no attribute 'ensure_configured''. After that, I found that no matter whatever module I try to load from flair it shows the same message. Please help!!!!

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
